00162 struct MySubWindow : public QMdiSubWindow {
00163     void closeEvent(QCloseEvent *e) {
00164         e->ignore();
00165     }
00166 };
00167 QMdiSubWindow *
00168 FrmKameMain::addDockableWindow(QMdiArea *area, QWidget *widget, bool closable) {
00169     QMdiSubWindow *wnd;
00170     if(closable) {
00171          wnd = new QMdiSubWindow();
00172          wnd->setAttribute(Qt::WA_DeleteOnClose);
00173     }
00174     else {
00175          wnd = new MySubWindow(); //delegated class, which ignores closing events.
00176          QAction *act = new QAction(widget->windowIcon(), widget->windowTitle(), this);
00177          connect(act, SIGNAL(triggered()), wnd, SLOT(showMaximized()));
00178          m_pViewMenu->addAction(act);
00179     }
00180     wnd->setWidget(widget);
00181     area->addSubWindow(wnd);
00182     wnd->setWindowIcon(widget->windowIcon());
00183     wnd->setWindowTitle(widget->windowTitle());
00184     wnd->showMaximized();
00185     return wnd;
00186 }

00190     m_pTimer->stop();
00191 
00192     m_measure.reset();
00193     g_signalBuffer.reset();
00194 }

00279     m_pMeasureMenu->addAction(m_pMesStopAction);
00280 
00281     m_pScriptMenu = menuBar()->addMenu( i18n( "&Script" ) );
00282     m_pScriptMenu->addAction(m_pScriptRunAction);

00290     m_pHelpMenu->addAction(m_pHelpContentsAction);
00291     m_pHelpMenu->addAction(m_pHelpIndexAction );
00292     m_pHelpMenu->addSeparator();
00293     m_pHelpMenu->addAction(m_pHelpAboutAction);

00295 
00296 void
00297 FrmKameMain::processSignals() {
00298     bool idle = g_signalBuffer->synchronize();
00299     if(idle) {
00300     #ifdef HAVE_LIBGCCPP
00301         static XTime last = XTime::now();
00302         if(XTime::now() - last > 3) {
00303             GC_gcollect();
00304             last = XTime::now();
00305         }
00306     #endif    
00307     }
00308 }
00309 
00310 void
00311 FrmKameMain::closeEvent( QCloseEvent* ce )
00312 {
00313     bool opened = false;
00314     atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> list(m_measure->interfaceList()->children());
00315     if(list) { 
00316         for(XNode::NodeList::const_iterator it = list->begin(); it != list->end(); it++) {
00317             shared_ptr<XInterface> _interface = dynamic_pointer_cast<XInterface>(*it);
00318             if(_interface->isOpened()) opened = true;
00319         }
00320     }
00321     if(opened) {
00322         QMessageBox::warning( this, "KAME", i18n("Stop running first.") );
00323         ce->ignore();
00324     }
00325     else {
00326         ce->accept();
00327         printf("quit\n");
00328         m_conMeasRubyThread.reset();
00329         m_measure->terminate();
00330    
00331         m_measure.reset();
00332     }
00333 }
00334 
00335 void FrmKameMain::fileCloseAction_activated()
00336 {
00337     m_conMeasRubyThread.reset();
00338     m_measure->terminate();
00339 }

00347 void FrmKameMain::fileOpenAction_activated()
00348 {
00349     QString filename = KFileDialog::getOpenFileName (
00350         KUrl(),
00351         "*.kam|KAME2 Measurement files (*.kam)\n"
00352         "*.mes|KAME1 Measurement files (*.mes)\n"
00353         "*.*|All files (*.*)",
00354         this,
00355         i18n("Open Measurement File"));
00356     openMes(filename);
00357 }

00359 
00360 void FrmKameMain::fileSaveAction_activated()
00361 {
00362     QString filename = KFileDialog::getSaveFileName (
00363         KUrl(),
00364         "*.kam|KAME2 Measurement files (*.kam)\n"
00365         "*.mes|KAME1 Measurement files (*.mes)\n"
00366         "*.*|All files (*.*)",
00367         this,
00368         i18n("Save Measurement File") );
00369     if(!filename.isEmpty())
00370     {
00371         std::ofstream ofs(filename.toLocal8Bit().data(), std::ios::out);
00372         if(ofs.good()) {
00373             XRubyWriter writer(m_measure, ofs);
00374             writer.write();
00375         }
00376     }
00377 }

00418 int
00419 FrmKameMain::openMes(const XString &filename)
00420 {
00421     if(!filename.empty())
00422     {
00423         runNewScript("Open Measurement", filename );
00424 //      while(rbthread->isAlive()) {
00425 //          KApplication::kApplication()->processEvents();
00426 //          g_signalBuffer->synchronize();
00427 //      }
00428 //          closeWindow(view);
00429         return 0;
00430     }
00431     return -1;
00432 }
00433 
00434 shared_ptr<XRubyThread>
00435 FrmKameMain::runNewScript(const XString &label, const XString &filename) {
00436     shared_ptr<XRubyThread> rbthread = m_measure->ruby()->
00437         create<XRubyThread>(label.c_str(), true, filename );
00438     FrmRubyThread* form = new FrmRubyThread(this);
00439     m_conRubyThreadList.push_back(xqcon_create<XRubyThreadConnector>(
00440                                       rbthread, form, m_measure->ruby()));
00441     addDockableWindow(m_pMdiCentral, form, true);
00442 
00443     // erase unused xqcon_ptr
00444     for(std::deque<xqcon_ptr>::iterator it = m_conRubyThreadList.begin();
00445         it != m_conRubyThreadList.end(); ) {
00446         if((*it)->isAlive()) {
00447             it++;
00448         }
00449         else {
00450             it = m_conRubyThreadList.erase(it);
00451         }
00452     }
00453     return rbthread;
00454 }
00455 void FrmKameMain::scriptRunAction_activated()
00456 {
00457     QString filename = KFileDialog::getOpenFileName (
00458         KUrl(),
00459         "*.seq|KAME Script files (*.seq)",
00460         this,
00461         i18n("Open Script File") );
00462     if(!filename.isEmpty()) {
00463         static unsigned int thread_no = 1;
00464         runNewScript(formatString("Thread%d", thread_no), filename );
00465         thread_no++;
00466     }
00467 }
00468 
00469 void FrmKameMain::scriptLineShellAction_activated()
00470 {
00471     QString filename = KStandardDirs::locate("appdata", "rubylineshell.rb");
00472     if(filename.isEmpty()) {
00473         g_statusPrinter->printError("No KAME ruby support file installed.");
00474     }
00475     else {
00476         static unsigned int int_no = 1;
00477         runNewScript(formatString("Line Shell%d", int_no), filename );
00478         int_no++;
00479     }
00480 }
00481 
00482 void FrmKameMain::scriptDotSaveAction_activated()
00483 {
00484     QString filename = KFileDialog::getSaveFileName (
00485         KUrl(),
00486         "*.dot|Graphviz dot files (*.dot)\n"
00487         "*.*|All files (*.*)",
00488         this,
00489         i18n("Save Graphviz dot File") );
00490     if(!filename.isEmpty())
00491     {
00492         std::ofstream ofs(filename.toLocal8Bit().data(), std::ios::out);
00493         if(ofs.good()) {
00494             XDotWriter writer(m_measure, ofs);
00495             writer.write();
00496         }
00497     }
00498 }
